Trade/Device Name(s): BioSci Disposable Virus Sampling Tube Kit
BioSci Disposable Virus Sampling Tube Tube-only format
Specimen Container(s): Screw-cap plastic tube (self-standing) pre-filled with transport medium
BioSci Disposable Virus Sampling Tube kit with swabs
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Sample collection and transport using transport medium
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BioSci Disposable Virus Sampling Tube for specimen collection and transport of clinical samples containing viruses or chlamydiae
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the collection and transport of clinical specimens containing viruses or chlamydiae from the collection site to the testing laboratory for processing using standard clinical laboratory procedures
